x u {d}15 i-ram-mu-šu₂-ma i-na mi-gir lib₃-bi-šu₂-nu it-tar-ru-šu₂-ma {m}tam-mar-it₂
x re-ṣu-ti {m}GIŠ.NU₁₁-MU-GI.NA ṣu-um-mu-ru šu-u₂ {lu₂}HAL-šu₂ u rab-ban-na-ti-šu₂

x 15 u 2.30 NA SIG BA₃{+ut} {m}AN.ŠAR₂-DU₃-IBILA LUGAL ŠU₂ ša₂ {d}UTU u {d}15 A₂ EREN₂-HI.A-šu₂ DU{+ku}-ma

x x it-ti EREN₂{+ni} {m}AN.ŠAR₂-DU₃-A na-ram DINGIR-MEŠ GAL-MEŠ ME₃ DU₃{+šu₂}-ma BAD₅.BAD₅-šu₂

x BA₃{+ut} {m}GIŠ.NU₁₁-MU-GI.NA
""
x ba-ru-tu šaṭ-ru ina mah-ri-i TA ŠA₃ EŠ₂.GAR₃ ki-i as-su-ha ana LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂
x mah-ru-tu LUGAL be-li₂ li-mur an-na-a-ti BA₃-MEŠ ša₂ LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂
$KI x ša₂ x x {m}tam-mar-it₂
x šum-ma ina IGI LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ mah-ru ana ŠA₃ EŠ₂.GAR₃ nu-še-rid
x re-ṣu-ti ša₂ {m}GIŠ.NU₁₁-MU-GI.NA il-la-ka a-x x
